name: Azkhamen's Quest
description:
Azkhamen's Quest is an RPG that follows Azkhamen the caterpillar on his journey to retrieve the Boar Queen's fruit. Oh, also he can teleport really quick.

Made for the "Hwlo RPG Game Jam 2021" by an awesome team!

Credits:

DavidBSound - SFX and Music

Mandarus - SFX

Kiba - Music

CybearTron - Art

and lastly myself - Programmer

External Assets used:

Castle Tiles for RPGs - OGA

Pixel Art Top-Down Basic by Cainos - Itch

LPC Interior Castle Tiles - OGA
